title: Design Studio-Based Autonomous Science Learning Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Participants possess digital tool proficiency and collaborative problem-solving experience, enabling real-time video classes and design software utilization in a BYOD environment.

learning_goals: Learners can explain design thinking processes for scientific problem-solving by dividing them into at least three stages
Learners can produce design prototypes reflecting peer feedback at least twice using collaboration tools
Learners can conduct design critique sessions in real-time video environments and rationally explain at least three of their scientific decisions
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
